dct_title_s: Orbis vetus, et orbis veteris utraque continens, terrarumq[ue] tractus, Arcticus, et Antarcticus : ex Platone, Theopompo, sive Æliano, Manilio &c.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. From: Tabulae geographicae ... [Padua] : Ex Typographia Seminarij, 1699. "The map is dated 1694 and it may have been issued separately before being published in atlas form in 1699."--cf. Shirley, R. The mapping of the world, p. 562
rights_statement_s:
No Known Copyright
